content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 2, Espanyol 1.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 2, Espanyol 1.
Foul by Abel Gómez (Granada CF).
Javi López (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Jaime Romero (Granada CF) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Ikechukwu Uche.
Substitution, Granada CF. Jaime Romero replaces Franco Jara.
Offside, Granada CF. Abel Gómez tries a through ball, but Dani Benítez is caught offside.
Rui Fonte (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ikechukwu Uche (Granada CF).
Substitution, Granada CF. Abel Gómez replaces Carlos Martins because of an injury.
Foul by Moisés Hurtado (Granada CF).
Joan Verdú (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Júlio César.
